name: Metro♫ome
description: This was a project with Hayden Reeve for GGJ19, the theme of home was loosely used as the idea of living in Australia, escaping from deadly solar radiation (in the form of energy blasts of course) with some fun music. Very loosely themed, but fun bullet hell game. There is a major bug where the game needs to be restarted after death, but this was the completed form at the end of the Jam.
